logged_time_id.description: Unique ID of the logged time entry

people_id.description: The ID of the person for the logged time entry

date.description: Date of the logged time entry

reference_date.description: The date on which to suppress a log time suggestion of the corresponding `task_id` in the UI

hours.description: Total hours of the logged time entry, will be rounded to 2 decimal places, `0` values are valid however this acts as a soft-delete so the response is hidden

billable.description: Shows if logged time entry is `1` = billable or `0` = non-billable. Determined by the associated project, phase or task

notes.example: This took a lot longer than planned because I didn't have the original illustrations
notes.description: Additional notes about this logged time entry

project_id.description: The ID of the project on which this entry was logged

phase_id.description: The ID of the project phase for which this entry was logged. A value of `0` indicates no phase is used

task_id.description: The ID of a scheduled allocation, when used with `reference_date` it suppresses a matching log time suggestion in the UI

task_name.description: The name of the project task against which this entry was logged, will create a project task name

task_meta_id.description: The ID of the associated project task (named for backwards compatibility), takes higher priority over `task_name`

locked.description: Is the logged time entry locked? `1` = true, `0` = false

locked_date.description: Date this logged time entry was last locked

created_by.description: ID of the account that created this record

modified.description: Date/time this record was last modified

modified_by.description: ID of the account that last modified this record
